home.app-function: Single entry point for ordering voice services in your country
home.sponsor: Built on CIO Hybrid Cloud Powered by Red Hat OpenShift
home.question: What service or country are you looking for?
home.search-text: Click here to see all results in GVS search
home.find-right-service: Find the right services, check their availability,
home.find-right-service2: and then choose the way you connect and work together.
home.jabber-description: Cisco Jabber is a multiple platform soft phone application to make and receive phone calls.

footer.aditional-question: Have additional questions about ordering Global Voice Services ?
footer.consult: * This website supports Mozilla Firefox, Google Chrome, IE, Edge and Safari.

footnote.Please bear in mind the following points: Please bear in mind the following points when making a request :
footnote.To make a request the Employee must exis: To make a request the Employee must exist in BluePages (except for cancellation requests).
footnote.You must know the IBM serial Number of t: You must know the IBM serial Number of the person making the request.
footnote.Only one request per employee per reques: Only one request per employee per request type is processed at a time.

Jabberservices.initiateJabber: Please select a request type below.

Jabbernewtrans.Reqnewservice: This request can be submitted for yourself, or on behalf of another employee. Fields marked with an asterisk
Jabbernewtrans.DeclarationAck: I have read and comply with the Algeria Mobility Policy, available here and I acknowledge reading the Privacy Notice.
Jabbernewtrans.Name: Name
Jabbernewtrans.norecord: There is no record of an IBM employee with serial number
Jabbernewtrans.EMAILcouldnotbefoundinbp: An email address for the serial number you entered could not be found in Bluepages. Please try again later.
Jabbernewtrans.opps: We're currently having trouble completing your request due to an unexpected error. Please reach out to the help desk to report this message. [SN Error]
Jabbernewtrans.pleasesubmittostart: By submitting this provisioning request, you are providing express written consent for IBM to process the Personal Information (PI) that you have provided as part of the provisioning process.Press submit to start the process of provisioning your Jabber service.

employeeinfotrans.ifinfoiscorrect: If the following information is correct, please click Next. Any errors must be corrected in the employee's
employeeinfotrans.Name: Name:
employeeinfotrans.noteligiblejabber: The serial number that you have entered is not eligible to request Jabber account.
employeeinfotrans.itnexistsforuser: The IBM Telephone Number (ITN) that exists for this user is .
employeeinfotrans.nojabber: There is no active Jabber account for this serial number. Please verify and try again.
employeeinfotrans.nojabberusethislink: The serial number you have entered does not own an IP Telephone Number (ITN) and so is not eligible for Jabber. Please use this link to raise a request for an ITN
employeeinfotrans.receiveITN: you have received the ITN you can then request Jabber.  Thank you.
employeeinfotrans.notauthorizedtoaccessjabber: The serial number that you have entered is not authorized to access Jabber service. You can access IP Extension option available on the left side menu. For any further queries about Jabber, please contact
employeeinfotrans.notauthorizedtoaccessip: The serial number that you have entered is not authorized to access IP Extension service. You can access Jabber option available on the left side menu. For any further queries about IP Extension, please contact
employeeinfotrans.noteligibletorequestmorethanonejabber: The serial number that you have entered is not eligible to request more than one Jabber account.
employeeinfotrans.jabberconfiguration: is already registered for this user. If you cannot see this ITN listed in Bluepages under Contact information, please reach out to the help desk.
employeeinfotrans.toinstallbegin: To install and begin using your Jabber account, please see
employeeinfotrans.furtherassistance: For any further assistance, please contact
employeeinfotrans.alreadyone: The serial number that you have entered has already one
employeeinfotrans.inprogess: request in progress and request number is
employeeinfotrans.ongoingrequestsbyclickonrequestpage: You can view the status of the on-going request by clicking on the Requests link on the left side navigation menu.
employeeinfotrans.isalreadybeingprocessed: is already being processed for this user. To view the status of this request, please click on Requests in the sidebar menu.
employeeinfotrans.Ifyoucannotsee: If you cannot see the request listed, or for any other issues, please reach out to the help desk.
employeeinfotrans.nooutstandingreq: No outstanding requests were found for the serial number.
employeeinfotrans.noresources: There are no resources for this serial number.
employeeinfotrans.nojabberforthisserial: There is no active Jabber account for this serial number. Please verify and try again.

Jabberentrydetails.alreadyhaveFixedPhone: If you already have Fixed Phone , please provide the identifier
Jabberentrydetails.toprocessPI: By submitting this provisioning request, you are providing your written consent to IBM to process the Personal Information (PI) provided.

alerttranslation.digitserialnumber: Employee Serial Number should be of 6 characters
alerttranslation.moverequest: This move request will delete the current Jabber account/ITN and assign a new one. Select OK to proceed, to Cancel to go back.
alerttranslation.serialnumbersareallowed: serial numbers are permitted to create
alerttranslation.selectjabbernumberdel: Please select the Jabber account/ITN being deleted.
alerttranslation.selectlocationsp: Please select the Jabber / Phone Location
alerttranslation.Homeandmobilealert: The serial number you have entered does not belong to the selected office location. Please choose your correct location, or select Home and Mobile.
alerttranslation.usaschedule: Selecting Home and Mobile will result in your service being assigned a phone number in the 720 area code. If you wish to have a number local to your office, or if you'd like to retain your existing office number, please wait for your site to be migrated to CHCS/Jabber. The USA site migration schedule can be found

fixedphonenew.NoteCombinationofandLength12: Note:Combination of (0 to 9 , A to F) and Length:12
fixedphonenew.Somethingseemswrong: We're currently having trouble completing your request due to an unexpected error. Please reach out to the help desk to report this message. [SN Error]
fixedphonenew.businesscos: Please provide a business justification for the selected class of service.
fixedphonenew.descriptioncharacters: Please provide a description (30 character limit).
fixedphonenew.entermacadd: Please provide the MAC address (12 character limit).
fixedphonenew.MACfieldAtoF: MAC field value to be in combination of 0 to 9 and A to F
fixedphonenew.initiateFixedPhoneservice: Please select a request type below.
fixedphonenew.MACAddressorPhoneNumber: Enter Current MAC Address or Phone Number
fixedphonenew.norecordfoundformac: No record was found for the Mac Address or Phone Number you have entered.Please check and try again.
fixedphonenew.Pleaseenternumber: Please enter a number to search
fixedphonenew.MACAddresssearch: Please provide the MAC address or phone number being updated.
fixedphonenew.enternewMACaddress: Please enter a new MAC address
fixedphonenew.providethereasonforupdate: Please provide the reason for the update.
fixedphonenew.differentDescriptionasisalready: Please choose a different Description as the current Description is already
fixedphonenew.cos: Please select a class of service.
fixedphonenew.NoteCombination: Note: Combination of (0 to 9 , A to F) and Length:12

specialrequest.OnlyusetheSpecialRequest: Special Requests are used to manage additional services for an existing Jabber account/ITN; to indicate the need for a telephony-related consultancy; or to create/manage special services: secondary IDs, support group hotlines, and/or shared lines or hunt groups.
specialrequest.needstandardservice: For standard services such as the creation of a new Jabber account/ITN, please use the options in the sidebar menu. Do not submit a Special Request or it will be rejected.
specialrequest.SpecialRequestHCSmigratedsite: Special Requests related to voice services are only permitted for sites migrated to CHCS/Jabber. If you need to submit a Special Request for a non-migrated site, please use
specialrequest.HelpTMACtool: Help related to TMAC can be found

otheralerts.selectthejabber: Please select the Jabber account/ITN being updated.
otheralerts.selectthejabbertomove: Select the Jabber / Phone Number  you wish to move
